original_text: In the Zin desert, when the people turned against me, you did not obey my command. That happened when you hit the rock to get water at Meribah Kadesh. You did not show the people that I was holy, so now you will not go into the land of Canaan.’
korean_text: 이는 신 광야에서 회중이 분쟁할 때에 너희가 내 명령을 거역하고 그 물 가에서 내 거룩함을 그들의 목전에 나타내지 아니하였음이니라 이 물은 신 광야 가데스의 므리바 물이니라

sentences.original_text: when the people turned against me
you did not obey my command
That happened when you hit the rock
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 네가 바위를 쳤을 때 일어났다

sentences.original_text: to get water at Meribah Kadesh
You did not show the people that I was holy
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 백성에게 나의 거룩함을 보이지 않았다

sentences.original_text: so now you will not go into the land of Canaan
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이제 너는 가나안 땅에 들어가지 못할 것이다
